Package squidpony.panel

Interface ICombinedPanel<T>

Type Parameters:
T - The type of colors.
All Known Implementing Classes:
ICombinedPanel.Impl
@Beta
public interface ICombinedPanel<T>
The combination of two panels, one to color the background, the other to write characters on the foreground.

  • There is a very generic implementation in this file: ICombinedPanel.Impl that you should use if you're combining generic things.
  • There is a libgdx-Group based implementation that offers more features and that you should likely use if you're a new user (in squidlib's display module).
Author:
smelC

    • putFG

      void putFG​(int x, int y, String string, T color)
      Puts the given string horizontally with the first character at the given offset. Does not word wrap. Characters that are not renderable (due to being at negative offsets or offsets greater than the grid size) will not be shown but will not cause any malfunctions.
      Parameters:
      x - the x coordinate of the first character
      y - the y coordinate of the first character
      string - the characters to be displayed
      color - the color to draw the characters

    • putFG

      void putFG​(int x, int y, IColoredString<T> cs)
      Puts the given string horizontally with the first character at the given offset. Does not word wrap. Characters that are not renderable (due to being at negative offsets or offsets greater than the grid size) will not be shown but will not cause any malfunctions.
      Parameters:
      x - the x coordinate of the first character
      y - the y coordinate of the first character
      cs - the text to be displayed, with its color.
